item.title: My First Post
item.description: Welcome to the wateR blog! I’ve been considering starting a water-centric data science blog for a while now. Getting this R-markdown website up and running has helped solidify my motivation to write regularly about water-related data science advances that are available to R users…and maybe Python users too (both are so useful!). Some of the specific goals of this blog are to (in no special order): * Practice my science communications skills.
